title: Add contact section, remove footer attribution, and enhance agency credibility content

requirements.summary: Add a dedicated Contact section and wire it into header navigation with smooth scrolling.
acceptanceCriteria: Header navigation includes a “Contact” item in both desktop and mobile menus.
Clicking “Contact” smoothly scrolls to a section with id="contact" (or equivalent) without routing changes.
The Contact section visibly displays the exact email “dkoda911@gmail.com” and WhatsApp number “+1 626-875-4603”.
Email is rendered as a mailto link and WhatsApp is rendered as a wa.me link (clickable).

file_operations.description: Create a new Contact section with id="contact" that displays dkoda911@gmail.com (as a mailto link) and +1 626-875-4603 (as a wa.me link). Use existing styling patterns and (optionally) shadcn-ui Card/Button primitives for consistent UI; verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.
Render the new ContactSection in the main page flow (no new routes) so it is reachable by smooth scroll navigation.
Add a “Contact” item to both desktop and mobile nav items that calls the existing smooth scroll helper to scroll to "contact".

requirements.summary: Remove the caffeine.ai attribution from the footer and keep the footer layout balanced.
acceptanceCriteria: No footer text or link referencing “caffeine.ai” appears anywhere in the UI.
Footer still displays the copyright line and does not look visually broken on mobile or desktop.

file_operations.description: Remove the “Built with … using caffeine.ai” attribution block (including icon/link and related variables) and adjust footer layout/alignment so the remaining content looks balanced across breakpoints.

requirements.summary: Enhance homepage marketing content with more detailed, credibility-oriented sections (services breakdown, process/timeline, social proof placeholders, and FAQ) while keeping existing sections and forms.
acceptanceCriteria: The homepage includes at least one new credibility-oriented section (e.g., FAQ) in addition to the existing sections.
Added content does not include unverifiable claims (no real client logos, brand names, or performance numbers unless provided by the user).
All new user-facing copy is in English and matches the site’s existing tone.
Existing application forms remain present and functional.

file_operations.description: Add a credibility-focused section that clearly breaks down services for Brands vs Creators (all English, no unverifiable claims). Use existing UI patterns (e.g., shadcn-ui Card) for layout consistency; verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.

Add a detailed process/timeline section describing what happens after someone applies (steps, typical sequence, what information is needed). Keep copy realistic and non-claiming. Use existing UI patterns (e.g., Cards/list styling); verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.

Add social proof placeholders (e.g., testimonial cards and/or “trusted by” logo placeholders) explicitly labeled as placeholders without real brand names or performance numbers. Use existing UI patterns (e.g., shadcn-ui Card); verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.

Add an FAQ section answering common questions for brands and creators. Implement with accessible markup (e.g., native details/summary or simple toggles) and keep all copy in English. If using any shadcn-ui primitives, verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.

Wire the new credibility-oriented sections into the existing marketing flow without removing “How It Works” or “What We Offer”. Ensure ids/spacing match the site’s scroll and layout conventions. If using shadcn-ui Card already in this file, verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.

requirements.summary: Update the footer “Get in Touch” area to include clickable email and WhatsApp contact details and remove copy implying forms are the only contact path.
acceptanceCriteria: Footer contains clickable email (mailto) and WhatsApp (wa.me) links with the exact provided values.
Footer copy no longer implies that the only way to contact is via the application form.

file_operations.description: Update the “Get in Touch” column to include clickable mailto:dkoda911@gmail.com and wa.me link for +1 626-875-4603, and revise the supporting copy so it does not imply the application form is the only contact method. Optionally add a “Contact” quick link that smooth-scrolls to the contact section.
